thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Mr. MICHELE DANZIERI
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. MICHELE DANZIERI

author: Mr. MICHELE DANZIERI
title: Mr. MICHELE DANZIERI
text: This was my first experience of booking with SkyLux Travel. I was connected to Pablo C who was extremely professional and thorough. He located an excellent deal for my last minute return flight to London and guided me through the reservation process in a very efficient manner. I will recommend SkyLux and Pablo C to my colleagues and friends, and will contact them again for my next trip.
